title: Ep 107 | Phil's Prediction for America, Si's Refusal to Get ESPN, and Tim Tebow Tales
description:
Phil predicts how long America has left if there's not a mass awakening that changes its trajectory. Jase and Al are baffled by Si's refusal to get ESPN. The guys trade Tim Tebow stories, including Al's Amsterdam encounter and the first time Jase met Tebow. And Phil, Jase, and Al respond to an audience email about what to do when you struggle with faith and whether or not God is real.
